game.beginning: You start as a novice adventurer in "Phoenix's Radiance"
game.ending: Defeating the dark forces, you restore balance to the world
game.synopsis: A young adventurer embarks on a quest to retrieve an artifact in a forgotten civilization. The game is filled with perilous challenges, unique characters, complex puzzles, and battles against unseen enemies. Its story revolves around uniting the world and overcoming chaos brought by evil forces. The journey culminates in retrieving the artifact and restoring harmony.
game.title: Phoenix's Radiance
